recipesJson.name: Strawberry Cheese Shake | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
After MaxSavage discovered he could taste strawberry utilizing WF Strawberry Gummy Candy, he wanted to tackle this profile; A Strawberry Cheesecake Shake.  Sounds simple enough but we created several versions before landing on this one, ...and it's delicious!   Full recipe notes at 
https://youtu.be/0UkggtC_RzI  .  

This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, and Folkart.
Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every other Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.

Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com - We now have Merch!
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

![Legacy](https://imgur.com/LA0lhIG.png)

reviews.text:
Strawberry Cheesecake Shake? ü§§ This one caught my eye right from the start... Just got the flavorings from BCF today and after seeing how fast this recipe got so many 5 üåü reviews I went for 120ml bottle from the start... Just made another 15ml mix for my wife and she says it's good üëç gonna give mine a couple hours to meld a lil and I'll be back in a couple more days for the review... Thanks guys! This one is gonna be a banger I feel... üëä
5 days later this is awesome! Great job!

I've tried to mix several time with WF strawberry cheesecake and each time this flavor annihilate everything you can throw at it...and unfortunately this recipe is no different.....at least to me....if a mix 3.5% of strawberry cheesecake stand alone and vape it side by side with this recipe both taste exactly the same..... I'm done with this flavor....I had to try your mix to see if it was possible to achieve something else with WF strawberry cheesecake but unfortunately it's impossible.....for those who can mix with it and taste the difference...well... I'm happy for you! üôÉ

This is an excellent, well balanced, strawberry cheesecake milkshake. I'm a hardcore strawberry mute, so at first, I didn't get any strawberry at all. I added a bit too much extra strawberry at first, which just made this weird. I mixed it again, boosted the strawberry gummy Candy by 1% and let it steep a couple days... Holy shit, guys! Not only is this delicious, but I'm now able to taste a profile I've chased since I started vaping. Excellent work, as always üçì

Hey guys you really nailed this one!  I make as many of your mixes as I can with 400 flavors often adding to my shopping list but had these flavors already. I saw this recipe as i follow the YouTube show, couldn't wait to mix it up. It was one of those 60ml right off the jump mixes man am i glad i did. Seriously deep balanced flavors. Awesome cheese shake!
Enjoying this one guy's it's good strait away  good work  much love
The strawberry combo on this is fire and everything is well balanced. Well done guys!
This is really good! Great mix once again. Thank you.
This is spot on. Off the shake its extremely cheesy, but after 3 days that cheese calms down and it turns into a perfect milkshake with strawberry cheesecake. Thanks for this one guys!
